name: Kickstarter Nexus
short_description:
Kickstarter Nexus is an app for the website kickstarter.com. Kickstarter is a website about funding independent projects. Unfortunaly there's only an iPhone app for this website and I want to change this.

This project requires Android 3.0 as minimum Android version. The app will contain a lot of functions like a search functionality, a "favorite" button to stay up-to-date on projects YOU like (notifying user might be and option) and much much more.

It would be nice if any other Android developers would like to develop this app together, so if you're interested, just contact me :)
summary: Upcoming Android App for the kickstarter.com website
